mapper.update:
UPDATE store
serial_number = #{serialNumber},
company_id = #{companyId},
activity_code = #{activityCode},
name = #{name},
is_detail = #{isDetail},
province_id = #{provinceId},
province = #{province},
city_id = #{cityId},
city = #{city},
county_id = #{countyId},
county = #{county},
area_id = #{areaId},
area = #{area},
detail_address = #{detailAddress},
discount = #{discount},
has_store_menu = #{hasStoreMenu},
description = #{description},
category_banner_id = #{categoryBannerId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
WHERE id = #{id}
